title: Add more classic games to Retro Arcade

requirements.text: Add three additional classic games to the app: Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper, each with a dedicated playable game page implemented in React/TypeScript and consistent UI/UX patterns (header back button, score panel, how-to-play panel, pause/reset controls where applicable, and end-of-game score submission dialog).

quotes: Can you add more classic games

acceptanceCriteria: There are new routes/pages for Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper that render and run without runtime errors.
Each new game has a scoring system and triggers a game-over (or win/lose) state that opens a name-entry dialog to submit the score.
Submitting a score uses the existing score submission flow (React Query mutation) and shows success/error toast feedback consistent with existing games.
All user-facing text on the new pages is in English.

requirements.text: Extend the Motoko backend to recognize the new games (Frogger, Galaga, Minesweeper) in getAvailableGames() and to store/retrieve high scores for each via getHighScores(), getPlayerScore(), and submitScore() without trapping for these games.

quotes: Can you add more classic games

acceptanceCriteria: backend/main.mo includes the three new games in the available games list with name/description/thumbnail fields.
backend/main.mo has per-game score maps and getGameScores() cases for Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper.
Calling getHighScores('Frogger'|'Galaga'|'Minesweeper') returns an array and does not trap.
Submitting a score for each new game persists the player’s best score (only replaces when the new score is higher), consistent with existing behavior.

requirements.text: Update the frontend routing and navigation wiring so the new game pages are reachable from the home game grid and from the leaderboard page (including deep-linking to the leaderboard with a selected game).

quotes: Can you add more classic games

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/App.tsx includes routes for Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx includes route mappings for Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper so 'Play Now' navigates correctly.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx allows selecting Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper and the 'Play {game}' button navigates to the correct route.
Leaderboard deep-linking via /leaderboard?game=<GameName> works for the new games.

requirements.text: Make the Leaderboard game list derive from the backend’s available games (getAvailableGames) instead of a hard-coded constant, so newly added games automatically appear as tabs without additional code changes.

quotes: Can you add more classic games

acceptanceCriteria: Leaderboard tabs are generated from the fetched available games list.
If the backend returns additional games in the future, they automatically show up as leaderboard tabs.
When switching tabs, the leaderboard fetches and displays the top scores for that selected game (still capped to top 10 by the existing query logic).

requirements.text: Add preview images for the new games as static assets and render them on the Home page game cards using the existing /assets/generated/* preview image convention.

quotes: Can you add more classic games

acceptanceCriteria: New preview images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the required filenames.
Home page game cards for Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper display the correct preview image and do not render broken images.
No preview images are served from or routed through the backend.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo if an upgrade-safe state migration is strictly required.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose existing UI components instead.
Use English for all user-facing strings added/changed by this request.
nonGoals: Adding multiplayer, real-time gameplay, or chat features.
Adding third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
Adding external databases or external backend services.

required: Retro pixel-art Galaga space shooter preview (galaga-preview.dim_300x200.png)
